name: Last Summer (itch)
description:
"Last Summer" is a Walking Horror Adventure Game.

Control the girl and go home. Dad is waiting for you.
It's already evening. Be careful as the road is dark.

Just go home ...
... It was just that, but it was strange ...

-------------------------------------------------------------------

All you can do is walk. There are no words.
Please experience the story spelled only with video and sound.

The game world is dark, mysterious and nostalgic.
You will feel loneliness and expectations similar to a night walk.

Do you get home, or ...

-------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is still under development.
The play time of this version is about 30minutes.
